location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to Stephen Watson Henshaw, Marine Agent, Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: The letter is informing the Bombay Government that the Resident is departing Bushire for Bussora [Basra] on board the Country Ship Moholar, and that Lieutenant Robert Taylor, the commander of the Residency Guard, is to be placed in charge of the Residency during his absence.
